title: Time for more "grounded" debuff Riot.
body: More champions need this if we want to punish these hyper mobile abominations that can gap close to you with every ability.

replies.body:
How about giving Viktor's W a Grounded effect?

It's literally a gravitational field and it's his only counterplay towards the very same assassins that can just easily dash out of it.

Besides, it's not like he's meta right now with his 48.5% win rate (what the fuck?). The guy needs some help.

Source: https://champion.gg/champion/Viktor/Middle
Make it Augumented W and sure
Yes yes yes, would give a better reason to augment it sooner if playing against an assassin.
A tactical decision? I love it!

> [{quoted}](name=GrReaper96,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=hl7wvE1u,comment-id=00000002,timestamp=2018-07-17T23:14:39.660+0000)

Hell yeah.

That'd also give more reason to upgrade your W first, since upgrading your W is usually what you do last since E and Q are just better.

While your at it Riot, can you fix jumps so when people get snared mid jump they actually stop and land where they got hit. Little annoying snagging a tristana mid jump only for her to just land at her tower.
amen

Actually, dashes like Lucian's and Ekko's use to be stopped mid dash by hard cc but all were changed so that if they are hit mid dash then they would finish their travel and be stunned wherever they landed. The thing with Tristana's w is that it is actually just a dash with a jump animation, and it has a long windup animation. The reason why it looks like she uses it after being hit with hard cc is the same situation where ezreal can teleport out of hard cc. It doesn't cancel it once it has already started using the movement ability, and the windup animation just makes it annoying.

Exactly what I thought while entering this topic.

Give him Grounding effect on W augment so he can decide to max it vs certain champions (Yasuo, new Akali, Fizz etc). He's a battle mage just like Cassio, and has delayed damage on each of his spells, so he could benefit a lot from a grounding effect. You could get rid of the pull to the center of the augmented spell, it's useful sometimes sure but it's really nothing compared to the Grounding potential.

What? No! What viktor needs is more Shields on his Q, less cooldown, more range, a nice shampoo, and he is good to go!

Totally not his damage back and/or some utility

rito -_-

Interesting. 

Yeah I can get behind that. I also saw discussions for Nunu's (new) ult having a grounding effect, so what else could we put this on without breaking the champion? 

I feel something like Anivia R would be too much given the uptime and cost,  but then there's something like Zac ult, where it would make sense not to being able to dash if you're standing in slime, while also making him less useless.
I'd love it if they did that.

Honestly, I feel this would be a great buff and niche for juggernauts like Darius, morde, illaoi etc., Such that if they meet certain conditions they should be grounded (except for flash) to exclusively punish hyperrmobile champs that get caught. Mobile champs have too few tradeoffs. If you don't have high range or tons of mobility or are a cc bot, then you are practically useless. I mean seriously what are juggers good for anymore? Can't duel the high mobility AA conquerors abusers, are poor in team fights, can't engage (unless aatrox maybe) low range generally, low cc, their tanky attributes hardly matter any more because of true damage meta, and they aren't even especially bursty. You can get ahead sometimes, but then you're still useless. Personally they should not lose duels to hyper mobile fighters and bruisers, but for some unknown reason fighters like jax and fiora actually get better survivability tools along with their scaling...eh rant over.
